title: How should I dedicate myself to work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the work and its relevance to you. Its all relative. You won’t give a damn until it would freaking affect your life in some way. Let’s say you have to do a work for a friend and he would fetch you $1000. On the same time you already have a request for a work that would fetch you $1200. After all the calculations which seems pretty easy, right? There is 95% probability that you’d opt the latter work. The same case, $1000 work is from a Tech Giant, let’s say Google! The calculations would change and you might settle for $1000 hoping for a good relation with Google in future. Although this example does not seem relevant, it just shows that you give power to your work. Unless you’re in it for real or it won’t affect you in an adverse way, rare is the possibility that you’d give a damn! Start searching for work that you care about and won’t mind doing that even at odd hours, even at Weekends, even when you’ve to go to a party. Then only you can dedicate yourself to it seamlessly. It will come automatically. It will flow through you. Have a great day!

To live and survive in this world you need Money at least for food. Money is not only concern to be dedicated towards work. But off course always be good at what you do. Keep doing that & mastering on particular thing is dedication it may be work or other thing. Life is simple,Love your life,Live it simple
